title: The Form Factors in the Sinh-Gordon Model
abstract: The most general solution to the form factor problem in the sinh-Gordon model is presented in an explicit way. The linearly independent classes of solutions correspond to powers of the elementary field. We show how the form factors of exponential operators can be obtained from the general solution by adjusting free parameters. The general formula obtained in the sinh-Gordon case reproduces the form factors of the scaling Lee-Yang model in a certain limit of the coupling constant.
